name: Chart Agent
description: This agent creates charts based on provided data and specifications.

chartType.description: Type of chart to generate (e.g., 'bar', 'line'). Other Chart.js types can be generated by providing a complete configuration in 'options'.

chartImage.description: URL of the generated chart image, hosted by QuickChart.io. This URL also serves to define the chart's specification.

message.description: A descriptive message about the task outcome (e.g., success or error details if applicable outside of task failure).
